text: Arin Joseph Hanson (born January 6, 1987), also called Egoraptor, is an American Internet celebrity, animator, cartoonist, comedian, voice actor, songwriter, and rapper. He is known for his popular Internet animations, for the popular YouTube Let's Play show Game Grumps, and for the video game parody band Starbomb. == Career == Hanson has worked on many things other than Game Grumps: === Internet animation series === * The Awesome Series - makes fun of video games like Pok√©mon, Metal Gear, Ninja Gaiden, and Final Fantasy * Sequelitis - an animated comedy video game review series comparing two different games in a series in a funny way. === Voice acting === * Shows and animations ** Rick and Morty ** Mighty Magiswords ** Cyanide & Happiness * Video games ** Dragon Age: Inquisition ** Detective Grimoire. === Music === Hanson often works with Starbomb band members from Ninja Sex Party, Dan Avidan and Brian Wecht. He sings guest vocals for their music and appears in their videos. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:American cartoonists Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Florida Category:Writers from Florida Category:American songwriters Category:People from West Palm Beach, Florida
title: Arin Hanson
